entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main character, Harry Potter. He is on a motorbike with Hagrid.

entities.name: stan
entities.description: A person who was trying to be disarmed by Harry earlier in the story.

entities.name: hagrid
entities.description: The gamekeeper at Hogwarts, driving a motorbike with Harry on it.

entities.name: voldemort
entities.description: The main antagonist, Lord Voldemort. He is flying through the air without any broomstick or thestral.

relationships.description: Hagrid is driving a motorbike with Harry on it. This is mentioned in the sentence: 'Hagrid let out a bellow of fear and steered the motorbike into a turn'.
Voldemort is trying to harm Harry, as mentioned in the sentence: 'two Killing Curses missed Harry by millimeters, cast from behind'.
